definition: at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at
flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: A true friend stabs you in the front.
sentences.chinese: 真朋侪才会当面中伤定位。

sentences.english: Or she might avoid going to the doctor to avoid confirmation of her fears.
sentences.chinese: 或许她可能会躲着医生，以避免当面确认她的恐惧。

sentences.english: Please Check Your Change and Ticket.
They praised him to his face.
I went over there, no punches, no shoves to the face, just confrontation.
sentences.chinese: 我走过去，没有动手，我只是想跟他作个当面对质。

sentences.english: The Soviet 36th Motorized Rifle Division and 5th Machine Gun Brigade opposed these forces.
sentences.chinese: 当面之敌为苏军第36摩步师和第5机枪旅。

sentences.english: I handed the book to him personally.
True friends stab you in the front.
You can also pay by cash, you will get a receipt from us.
sentences.chinese: 您还可以当面付款，本所给您开据收据作为凭证。

sentences.english: Puccini meets a young journalist who questions him and directs him towards the original sources of his vocation.
sentences.chinese: 一位年轻的记者当面质问了普契尼的创作灵感的来源。

sentences.english: I want him to identify him enemy Tong Pak Fu.
sentences.chinese: 让他当面认一下，他不共戴天的仇人唐伯虎。

sentences.english: But he regretted the pleasantry; it was too near a satire.
sentences.chinese: 后来一想，这句笑话太象当面挖苦了，他又后悔起来。

sentences.english: She threw the lie in his face.
When facing north, right to left.
sentences.chinese: 当面朝北坐时，从右到左排。

sentences.english: ChengYi aware of the true nature of the event, then alone to find confronted everlasting light.
sentences.chinese: 承义察觉到事件的真相后，便独自找永光当面对质。

sentences.english: Interested parties may contact the message after about face to face in Beijing to see the goods.
sentences.chinese: 有意者可短信联系后约在北京当面看货。

definition: in front of/in the presence of
one's own mouth/fig. in one's own words/to say sth personally
to appear personally/to step in/to step forth/to show up
see 直截了當|直截了当[zhi2 jie2 liao3 dang4]
to question/to ask questions/to inquire/to bring to account/to interrogate
to fall out with sb/to become hostile
